name: Sigala
description: '''Bruce Fielder''' (born 1 November 1992), known professionally as '''Sigala''', is an English DJ and record producer. He has had eight songs peak within the top ten of the [[UK Singles Chart]], including his 2015 debut single "[[Easy Love (Sigala song)|Easy Love]]", which interpolates "[[ABC (The Jackson 5 song)|ABC]]" by [[the Jackson 5]].
